wikipedia_page.main:
William Burton (born 3 September 1956 in Felixstowe, England) is a former motorcycle speedway rider in National League (speedway).
Joined Sheffield Tigers in 1977 in a swap for Carl Glover. Had 37 appearances in 1978 averaging fewer than 3 points per match.

response: William, Willie, Bill, or Billy Burton may refer to:
* Billy Burton (born 1956), English motorcycle speedway rider
